frontmatter.title: Card
frontmatter.description: `Form.Card` is a wrapper for the Card component to make it easier to use inside a form.

frontmatter.title: Section
frontmatter.description: `Form.Section` lets you compose blocks of fields and values to be reused in different contexts.

frontmatter.title: ViewContainer
frontmatter.description: `Form.Section.ViewContainer` enables users to toggle (with animation) the content of each item between the view and edit container.

frontmatter.title: EditContainer
frontmatter.description: `Form.Section.EditContainer` enables users to toggle (with animation) the content of each item between the view and edit container.

frontmatter.title: Appearance
frontmatter.description: `Form.Appearance` is a provider for theming form fields.

frontmatter.title: ButtonRow
frontmatter.description: `Form.ButtonRow` is a wrapper for horizontally separated buttons.

frontmatter.title: Handler
frontmatter.description: `Form.Handler` provides both the DataContext.Provider and a HTML form element.

frontmatter.title: Isolation
frontmatter.description: `Form.Isolation` lets you isolate parts of your form so data and validations are not shared between the `Form.Handler` until you want to.

frontmatter.title: MainHeading
frontmatter.description: `Form.MainHeading` is a standardized main heading for sections, ensuring default layout, spacing etc.

frontmatter.title: SubHeading
frontmatter.description: `Form.SubHeading` is a standardized sub heading for sections, ensuring default layout, spacing etc.

frontmatter.title: SubmitButton
frontmatter.description: `Form.SubmitButton` connects to the `Form.Handler` to submit the active state of the internal DataContext, triggering `onSubmit`.

frontmatter.title: SubmitConfirmation
frontmatter.description: `Form.SubmitConfirmation` can be used to prevent the `Form.Handler` from submitting, and makes it possible to show a confirmation dialog in different scenarios.

frontmatter.title: SubmitIndicator
frontmatter.description: `Form.SubmitIndicator` lets you show an indicator while async form operations are performed.

frontmatter.title: Toolbar
frontmatter.description: `Form.Section.Toolbar` is a helper component to be used within an `Form.Section.ViewContainer` and `Form.Section.EditContainer`.

frontmatter.title: Visibility
frontmatter.description: `Form.Visibility` makes it possible to hide components and elements on the screen based on the dynamic state of data.

frontmatter.title: clearData
frontmatter.description: `Form.clearData` lets you clear the data of a form.

frontmatter.title: getData
frontmatter.description: `Form.getData` lets you access your form data outside of the form context.

frontmatter.title: setData
frontmatter.description: `Form.setData` lets you set or modify your form data outside of the form context.

frontmatter.title: useData
frontmatter.description: `Form.useData` lets you access or modify your form data outside of the form context within your application.

frontmatter.title: useSnapshot
frontmatter.description: `Form.useSnapshot` lets you store data snapshots of your form data, either inside or outside of the form context.

frontmatter.title: useTranslation
frontmatter.description: `Form.useTranslation` is a hook that returns the translations for the current locale.

frontmatter.title: useValidation
frontmatter.description: `Form.useValidation` lets you monitor and modify field status or your form errors outside of the context.
